experiences.title: Our Experience
experiences.description:
With more than 5 years of experience in the creative and technological industry, at Xitry Game we have cultivated a multidisciplinary approach that ranges from video game development to the creation of custom interactive solutions.
Our trajectory has allowed us to master tools such as Unity, Unreal Engine, Blender, and cutting-edge web technologies. Thanks to this journey, we have learned to combine creativity, technique, and strategic vision to offer solid, immersive, and functional projects.

faqs.question: What type of projects do you accept?
faqs.answer: We work with companies, entrepreneurs, and creative studios. We accept everything from conceptual ideas to advanced technical projects. We adapt to different scales and needs.

faqs.question: Can I hire you for a specific part of my project?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can work on components such as programming, 3D art, animations, or systems integration. We also collaborate as external reinforcement for other studios.

faqs.question: What is the work process?
faqs.answer: First, we analyze your idea or need. Then we define scope, budget, and timelines. We use agile methodologies and share constant progress. Communication is key for us.

faqs.question: Do you offer post-launch support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer maintenance plans, technical support, updates, or improvements according to your project. We are interested in your product evolving correctly.
